case_summary: Wrongful termination following disability accommodation requests and safety violation complaints. Employee was terminated in retaliation for reporting building safety violations and requesting reasonable accommodations for disability.
safety_violations: Building safety violations at 3355 Wilshire Blvd
discrimination_description: Employee was denied reasonable accommodations, subjected to discriminatory treatment based on disability, and ultimately terminated after complaining about unsafe working conditions.
adverse_actions: Termination, negative performance reviews, denial of accommodations
complainant_statement: I am standing up for my rights and the safety of all workers. No one should face discrimination or retaliation for reporting unsafe conditions or requesting accommodations they are entitled to under the law.
